description:
MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY hold a photo session in the woods, brandishing their smartphones.  While they`re totally into their shooting, HAPPY disappears all of a sudden. A certain doom falls on MILPOM and the others!  Can the four girls survive it!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jibun no Roots toka Kangaehajimeru to Ichinichi ga 24 Jikan ja Tarinakunatte Kuru yo ne?
When You Start to Wonder About Your Roots, Is Thinking 24/7 Ever Enough?
自分のルーツとか考え始めると一日が24時間じゃ足りなくなってくるよね?
